name: Dragon Booster
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Release the Dragon!

A DRAGON-HUMAN WAR THREATENS DRAGON CITY. ARTHA PENN IS CHOSEN TO BE THE DRAGON BOOSTER, THE ONLY PERSON WHO CAN BRING PEACE TO WORLD. PLAY AS ARTHA AND RELEASE THE HERO WITHIN!

(screenshot captions)
  • FIVE DIFFERENT MODES
  • BUY GEAR TO MAKE DRAGONS FASTER AND STRONGER
  • RACE AGAINST FRIENDS WIRELESSLY!
